languages.text: "Да уж, координаты, мягко говоря, неточные. Но если сканировать прицельно, наши авгуры могут и засечь подлого ксеноса. Точнее то, что от него осталось".

traits.locale_text: "Да уж, координаты, мягко говоря, неточные. Но если сканировать прицельно, наши авгуры могут и засечь подлого ксеноса. Точнее то, что от него осталось".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."
languages.original_text: "Да уж, координаты, мягко говоря, неточные. Но если сканировать прицельно, наши авгуры могут и засечь подлого ксеноса. Точнее то, что от него осталось".

traits.locale_text: "Well, the coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, the coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, the coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, the coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Las coordinadas son poco precisas, siendo generosos. Pero si dirigimos los sensores, nuestros augures podrían localizar a ese despreciable xenos. O lo que quede de él, más bien».
languages.original_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, las coordenadas son poco precisas, por decirlo finamente. Pero si dirigimos los sensores, nuestros augures podrían localizar a ese despreciable xenos. O lo que quede de él, más bien».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “确切而言，目前的坐标相当模糊。不过，如果对那片区域进行彻底扫描，我们的俄歇矩阵或许能发现那个该死的异形渣滓，或是他残留下来的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: “确切而言，目前的坐标并不精准。不过，如果对那片区域进行彻底扫描，我们的俄歇矩阵或许就能发现那只邪恶的异形。或者说，发现他留下的任何东西。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Le moins que l'on puisse dire, c'est que les coordonnées sont imprécises. Cependant, en croisant les analyses, nos augures devraient parvenir à repérer ce xénos... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
languages.original_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: « Le moins que l'on puisse dire, c'est que les coordonnées sont imprécises. Cependant, en effectuant des recherches ciblées, nos augures devraient parvenir à repérer ce xénos... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「座標は不明確です。ただ、スキャナーでターゲットできれば、汚れた異種族を発見することはできるでしょう。それが残骸であろうとも…」
languages.original_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: 「座標は不明確です。ただ、スキャナーでターゲットできれば、汚れた異種族を発見することはできるでしょう。それが残骸であろうとも…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, die Koordinaten sind vage, um es vorsichtig zu sagen. Aber wenn wir die Scans genauer lokalisieren können, finden unsere Auguren den Xenos-Abschaum vielleicht. Oder was von ihm übrig ist."
languages.original_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, die Koordinaten sind ungenau, um es vorsichtig auszudrücken. Wenn wir aber die Scans überwachen, dann können unsere Auguren den schändlichen Xenos vielleicht entdecken. Oder was von ihm übrig ist."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Yani koordinatlar, kibarca söylemek gerekirse muğlak. Ancak taramaların kesin konumunu saptarsak alametlerimiz, zeno pisliğinin yerini belirleyebilir. Ondan geriye kalanları demek daha uygun olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Well, the coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."
